member.summary: The total number of file entries in the arc.

member.summary: Frees the resources associated with this ARC

member.summary: Tries to create from .
member.returns: true if the ARC file was opened successfully

member.summary: Tries to create from .
member.returns: true if the ARC file was opened successfully

member.summary: Tries to extract the uncompressed contents of to .
member.param: The destination file for the extracted contents
member.returns: true if the file was extracted succesfully

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.GetRootNodes
member.summary: Gets the child nodes of the ARC sorted in ascending alphabetical order. These will mostly likely be (ex: "fighter/").
member.returns: the child nodes of ARC root

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFile.GetChildren(SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode)
member.summary: Gets the children of sorted in ascending alphabetical order, which may be or . The resulting list will be empty if there are no children.

member.name: T:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode
member.summary: A directory or file listing in the ARC.

member.name: T:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.FileType
member.summary: Indicates whether the node is a directory or file.

member.name: F:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.FileType.Directory
member.summary: A directory that will likely contain child nodes.

member.name: F:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.FileType.File
member.summary: A file node that will likely have exportable contents and have no children.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.Type
member.summary: The type of file.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.Path
member.summary: The absolute path of the directory or file.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.Offset
member.summary: The file data's offset in bytes

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.CompSize
member.summary: The size of the file data in bytes.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.DecompSize
member.summary: The size of the file data in bytes after being decompressed.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.IsStream
member.summary: true if the file is a stream file

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.IsShared
member.summary: true if the file data is shared with other files.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.IsRedirect
member.summary: true if the file is redirected.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.IsRegional
member.summary: true if the file regional.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.IsLocalized
member.summary: true if the file is localized.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.IsCompressed
member.summary: true if the file is compressed.

member.name: P:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.UsesZstd
member.summary: true if the file uses zstd compression.

member.name: M:SmashArcNet.ArcFileTreeNode.ToString
member.summary:
The string representation of this
examples: "F file.txt", "D dir/dir2"
member.returns: the type and path as a string
